languages.text: "Более того, с тех пор как ты поставил{mf||а} им {d|Encyclopedia:Ch2_JanusChaosFood}продовольствие{/d}, ересь на Футфоле лишь приумножилась! Фанатики, зовущие себя "жатвенниками", распространяют свои богохульные учения в Теневых кварталах. Безумцам мало зерна — они втайне жрут своих братьев и сестер на еретических пирах! Не иначе как сытая чернь почувствовала свою безнаказанность и забыла о долге перед Императором".

"What is more, ever since you gave them {d|Encyclopedia:Ch2_JanusChaosFood}provisions{/d}, heresy on Footfall has only increased! Fanatics calling themselves 'harvesters' are spreading their blasphemous doctrines in the Shadow Quarters. Grain is not enough for those madmen — no, they devour their brothers and sisters at secret heretical feasts! The well-fed rabble have surely sensed they are free to act with impunity and have forgotten their duty to the Emperor."
languages.original_text: "Более того, с тех пор как ты поставил{mf||а} им {d|Encyclopedia:Ch2_JanusChaosFood}продовольствие{/d}, ересь на Футфоле лишь приумножилась! Фанатики, зовущие себя "жатвенниками", распространяют свои богохульные учения в Теневых кварталах. Безумцам мало зерна — они втайне жрут своих братьев и сестер на еретических пирах! Не иначе как сытая чернь почувствовала свою безнаказанность и забыла о долге перед Императором".

traits.locale_text: "What is more, ever since you gave them provisions, heresy on Footfall has only increased! Fanatics calling themselves 'harvesters' are spreading their blasphemous doctrines in the Shadow Quarters. Grain is not enough for those madmen — no, they devour their brothers and sisters at secret heretical feasts! The well-fed rabble have surely sensed they are free to act with impunity and have forgotten their duty to the Emperor."

"What is more, ever since you gave them provisions, heresy on Footfall has only increased! Fanatics calling themselves 'harvesters' are spreading their blasphemous doctrines in the Shadow Quarters. Grain is not enough for those madmen — no, they devour their brothers and sisters at secret heretical feasts! The well-fed rabble have surely sensed they are free to act with impunity and have forgotten their duty to the Emperor."

Grain is not enough for those madmen — no, they devour their brothers and sisters at secret heretical feasts! The well-fed rabble have surely sensed they are free to act with impunity and have forgotten their duty to the Emperor."

"What is more, ever since you gave them provisions, heresy on Footfall has only increased! Fanatics calling themselves 'harvesters' are spreading their blasphemous doctrines in the Shadow Quarters. Grain is not enough for those madmen — no, they devour their brothers and sisters at secret heretical feasts! The well-fed rabble have surely sensed they are free to act with impunity and have forgotten their duty to the Emperor."

languages.text: "Zudem hat die Verteilung von {d|Encyclopedia:Ch2_JanusChaosFood}Vorräten{/d} durch Euch dazu geführt, dass es nun noch mehr Ketzerei auf Footfall gibt! Fanatiker, die sich 'Ernter' nennen, verbreiten die blasphemische Doktrin in den Schattenquartieren. Getreide reicht diesen Wahnsinnigen nicht – nein, sie verschlingen bei geheimen ketzerischen Festmahlen ihre Brüder und Schwestern! Der gut genährte Pöbel hat erkannt, dass er straflos agieren kann, und seine Pflicht gegenüber dem Imperator vergessen."
languages.original_text: "What is more, ever since you gave them {d|Encyclopedia:Ch2_JanusChaosFood}provisions{/d}, heresy on Footfall has only increased! Fanatics calling themselves 'harvesters' are spreading their blasphemous doctrines in the Shadow Quarters. Grain is not enough for those madmen — no, they devour their brothers and sisters at secret heretical feasts! The well-fed rabble have surely sensed they are free to act with impunity and have forgotten their duty to the Emperor."

traits.locale_text: "Zudem hat die Verteilung von Vorräten durch Euch dazu geführt, dass es nun noch mehr Ketzerei auf Footfall gibt! Fanatiker, die sich 'Ernter' nennen, verbreiten die blasphemische Doktrin in den Schattenquartieren. Getreide reicht diesen Wahnsinnigen nicht – nein, sie verschlingen bei geheimen ketzerischen Festmahlen ihre Brüder und Schwestern! Der gut genährte Pöbel hat erkannt, dass er straflos agieren kann, und seine Pflicht gegenüber dem Imperator vergessen."

languages.text: “而且，自从你给了他们{d|Encyclopedia:Ch2_JanusChaosFood}粮食{/d}以后，落脚港的异端邪说反而变得愈演愈厉！那些自称‘收割者’的狂热分子正在阴影区传播他们亵渎神明的教义。对那群疯子来说，光是有粮食根本不够！他们甚至会举行邪恶的秘密盛宴，饱饮他们兄弟姐妹的血肉！那些吃饱了饭的乌合之众肯定以为可以为所欲为，不受任何惩罚。他们已经忘记了对帝皇的责任。”
languages.original_text: "What is more, ever since you gave them {d|Encyclopedia:Ch2_JanusChaosFood}provisions{/d}, heresy on Footfall has only increased! Fanatics calling themselves 'harvesters' are spreading their blasphemous doctrines in the Shadow Quarters. Grain is not enough for those madmen — no, they devour their brothers and sisters at secret heretical feasts! The well-fed rabble have surely sensed they are free to act with impunity and have forgotten their duty to the Emperor."

traits.locale_text: “而且，自从你给了他们粮食以后，落脚港的异端邪说反而变得愈演愈厉！那些自称‘收割者’的狂热分子正在阴影区传播他们亵渎神明的教义。对那群疯子来说，光是有粮食根本不够！他们甚至会举行邪恶的秘密盛宴，饱饮他们兄弟姐妹的血肉！那些吃饱了饭的乌合之众肯定以为可以为所欲为，不受任何惩罚。他们已经忘记了对帝皇的责任。”

languages.text: « Pire encore, depuis que vous leur avez donné des {d|Encyclopedia:Ch2_JanusChaosFood}provisions{/d}, Castel a sombré encore plus dans l'hérésie ! Des fanatiques qui se font appeler les "moissonneurs" répandent leurs doctrines impies dans le Quartier des Ombres. Pour ces déments, le grain ne suffit pas. Non, ils dévorent leurs frères et sœurs lors de festins hérétiques secrets ! Rassasiés comme ils sont, ces misérables semblent croire qu'ils peuvent agir en toute impunité et ont oublié leur devoir envers l'Empereur. »
languages.original_text: "What is more, ever since you gave them {d|Encyclopedia:Ch2_JanusChaosFood}provisions{/d}, heresy on Footfall has only increased! Fanatics calling themselves 'harvesters' are spreading their blasphemous doctrines in the Shadow Quarters. Grain is not enough for those madmen — no, they devour their brothers and sisters at secret heretical feasts! The well-fed rabble have surely sensed they are free to act with impunity and have forgotten their duty to the Emperor."

traits.locale_text: « Pire encore, depuis que vous leur avez donné des provisions, Castel a sombré encore plus dans l'hérésie ! Des fanatiques qui se font appeler les "moissonneurs" répandent leurs doctrines impies dans le Quartier des Ombres. Pour ces déments, le grain ne suffit pas. Non, ils dévorent leurs frères et sœurs lors de festins hérétiques secrets ! Rassasiés comme ils sont, ces misérables semblent croire qu'ils peuvent agir en toute impunité et ont oublié leur devoir envers l'Empereur. »

languages.text: «Y la cosa no acaba ahí: desde que les dio las {d|Encyclopedia:Ch2_JanusChaosFood}provisiones{/d}, ¡la herejía se ha intensificado en Paso! Unos fanáticos que se hacen llamar "cosechadores" propagan sus blasfemas doctrinas en los barrios bajos. No les basta con los cereales, no. ¡Se devoran entre ellos en festines heréticos! Esta chusma bien nutrida debe de saber que pueden actuar impunemente y han olvidado su deber hacia el Emperador».
languages.original_text: "What is more, ever since you gave them {d|Encyclopedia:Ch2_JanusChaosFood}provisions{/d}, heresy on Footfall has only increased! Fanatics calling themselves 'harvesters' are spreading their blasphemous doctrines in the Shadow Quarters. Grain is not enough for those madmen — no, they devour their brothers and sisters at secret heretical feasts! The well-fed rabble have surely sensed they are free to act with impunity and have forgotten their duty to the Emperor."

traits.locale_text: «Y la cosa no acaba ahí: desde que les dio las provisiones, ¡la herejía se ha intensificado en Paso! Unos fanáticos que se hacen llamar "cosechadores" propagan sus blasfemas doctrinas en los barrios bajos. No les basta con los cereales, no. ¡Se devoran entre ellos en festines heréticos! Esta chusma bien nutrida debe de saber que pueden actuar impunemente y han olvidado su deber hacia el Emperador».

languages.text: 「しかも、お前たちがヤツらに{d|Encyclopedia:Ch2_JanusChaosFood}食糧{/d}を与えて以来、フットフォールでの異端は増えるばかりだ！『収穫者』などと名乗る狂信者どもが、シャドウクォーターで冒涜的な教義を広めている。あの狂人どもは穀物だけでは飽き足らず、秘された異端の宴で兄弟姉妹をも貪っているのだ！肥え太った暴徒たちは、己が自由に振る舞うことができると感じ、皇帝への責務をも忘れてしまったのだろう」
languages.original_text: "What is more, ever since you gave them {d|Encyclopedia:Ch2_JanusChaosFood}provisions{/d}, heresy on Footfall has only increased! Fanatics calling themselves 'harvesters' are spreading their blasphemous doctrines in the Shadow Quarters. Grain is not enough for those madmen — no, they devour their brothers and sisters at secret heretical feasts! The well-fed rabble have surely sensed they are free to act with impunity and have forgotten their duty to the Emperor."

traits.locale_text: 「しかも、お前たちがヤツらに{d|Encyclopedia:Ch2_JanusChaosFood}食糧{/d}を与えて以来、フットフォールでの異端は増えるばかりだ！『収穫者』などと名乗る狂信者どもが、シャドウクォーターで冒涜的な教義を広めている。あの狂人どもは穀物だけでは飽き足らず、秘された異端の宴で兄弟姉妹をも貪っているのだ！肥え太った暴徒たちは、己が自由に振る舞うことができると感じ、皇帝への責務をも忘れてしまったのだろう」

「しかも、お前たちがヤツらに{d|Encyclopedia:Ch2_JanusChaosFood}食糧{/d}を与えて以来、フットフォールでの異端は増えるばかりだ！『収穫者』などと名乗る狂信者どもが、シャドウクォーターで冒涜的な教義を広めている。あの狂人どもは穀物だけでは飽き足らず、秘された異端の宴で兄弟姉妹をも貪っているのだ！肥え太った暴徒たちは、己が自由に振る舞うことができると感じ、皇帝への責務をも忘れてしまったのだろう」

languages.text: "Dahası, {d|Encyclopedia:Ch2_JanusChaosFood}erzak{/d} ulaştırdığından beri Binliman'daki sapkınlık azalmak bilmedi! Kendilerine 'hasatçı' diyen fanatikler, Gölge Mahalli'nde küfür dolu öğretilerini yayıyor. Bu delilere ekmek falan yetmiyor. Gizli, sapkın ziyafetlerde kendi kardeşlerini yiyorlar! Karnı doyan ayaktakımı belli ki ceza korkmalarına gerek olmadığını anlamış, İmparator'a karşı görevlerini besbelli unutmuş."
languages.original_text: "What is more, ever since you gave them {d|Encyclopedia:Ch2_JanusChaosFood}provisions{/d}, heresy on Footfall has only increased! Fanatics calling themselves 'harvesters' are spreading their blasphemous doctrines in the Shadow Quarters. Grain is not enough for those madmen — no, they devour their brothers and sisters at secret heretical feasts! The well-fed rabble have surely sensed they are free to act with impunity and have forgotten their duty to the Emperor."

traits.locale_text: "Dahası, erzak ulaştırdığından beri Binliman'daki sapkınlık azalmak bilmedi! Kendilerine 'hasatçı' diyen fanatikler, Gölge Mahali'nde küfür dolu öğretilerini yayıyor. Bu delilere ekmek falan yetmiyor. Gizli, sapkın ziyafetlerde erkek ve kız kardeşlerini yiyorlar! Karnı doyan ayaktakımı belli ki ceza korkuları kalmadığını anladı ve İmparator'a karşı görevlerini besbelli unuttu."
